```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# load necessary packages 
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(rio, here, tidyverse, dplyr, scales, skimr, formatR, gridExtra, janitor, DT, flexdashboard, fontawesome)

# import cleaned NHANES dataset
nhanes_data <- import(here("assessment", "cleaned_NHANES.csv"))


```

### Gauge
```{r}
# insert gauge
gauge(
  value = 57,
  min = 0,
  max = 100,
  symbol = "%"
)
```

### Value
```{r}

# insert valuebox
library(flexdashboard)
valueBox(
 31,
 caption = "Percentage of individuals with an average blood pressure above 120 mm Hg",
 icon = "fa-heart", 
 color = "warning"
 )
```
